modName: High Hrothgar with Just In Time Lighting
summary: A fully functioning High Hrothgar cell with 15 shadow casting lights.  In vanilla, there are only two.
descriptionHtml:
Requires:  Just In Time Lighting v1.12 (or newer).

Just In Time Lighting Dynamic Scripts and Tutorial: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10361


This is a fully functioning mod, featuring High Hrothgar with 15 shadow-casting lights.  

I made this as an example of how to use my scripts to directly control lights, allowing modders to sidestep the engine\'s light limit.


But, again, it\'s fully functional.  So, I released it as a separate mod.


All changes are limited to the High Hrothgar cell, except for one minor change:

I modified the color of light emitted from the non-shadow casting defaultTorch_Fast so that it now matches the color of its shadow casting version.   In vanilla, they are slightly different for no reason.


You shouldn\'t notice any performance hit.  I made sure that there is no triple-light-overlap in the cell.  But, if your computer already struggles with in High Hrothgar (unlikely), then this will obviously make it run worse.

I have no problems running this cell on my PC that I built for myself in December of 2008.
author: Daemonjax
